H0.text: Head is the part of the sperm that contains the nucleus.

H1.text: The body is the part of the sperm that contains the nucleus.

H2.text: Tail is the part of the sperm that contains the nucleus.

H3.text: The nucleus is the part of the sperm that contains the nucleus.

A4.text: Head: contains the nucleus with densely coiled chromatin fibers
